channel.title: Tesla Shorts Time Daily
channel.description: Daily Tesla news digest and podcast hosted by Patrick in Vancouver. Covering the latest Tesla developments, stock updates, and short squeeze celebrations.
channel.itunes:author: Patrick
channel.itunes:summary: Daily Tesla news digest and podcast covering the latest developments, stock updates, and short squeeze celebrations.
